spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout mismatches between plan and render. (E2/E4) Right-side bedroom/bath cluster and central-right hallway do not match the 2D partitioning; several interior walls are shifted/shortened, changing circulation. (E3) Multiple door locations/orientations from the plan (notably the bottom-center main entry and several right-hall doors) are not represented correctly; render uses generic openings that don’t align to the plan. (E2) Window locations/counts do not match the plan (missing several exterior windows and mispositioned openings). (E4) Room proportions are distorted: the central living/dining area reads oversized relative to adjacent rooms, and some side rooms are undersized compared to the 2D plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness appears mostly consistent, but structural fidelity to the plan is weak. (E1) Exterior annex/balcony spaces shown on the 2D plan (left-side outdoor dining/terrace and right-side small balcony/box) are missing. (E1/E2) Bathrooms/wet areas shown on the 2D plan are not faithfully built (rooms present but fixtures/organization absent or incorrect). (E2) Adjacency relationships on the right side (bedroom-to-bath/hall connections) are altered due to different wall/door layout. (E5) Some internal partitioning creates ambiguous extra/altered room shapes not present in the 2D plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: (E1) Furniture set is incomplete vs plan (missing/incorrect bathroom fixtures and missing/incorrect bedroom furnishing count/locations). (E2) Living/dining furniture is only loosely aligned to the plan; kitchen furnishing/counters do not clearly match the 2D kitchen layout. (E4) Scale feels inconsistent: central furniture appears small relative to the enlarged living zone.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, readable isometric-style render with coherent materials. Camera is acceptable isometric/axonometric and composition is clear. Minor issues: openings/doors look simplified and some geometry feels overly generic (E6), reducing architectural clarity, but lighting and overall cleanliness are good.

detected_errors.description: Left-side exterior terrace/outdoor dining area shown in the 2D plan is missing in the 3D render.
Right-side small exterior balcony/box shown in the 2D plan is missing in the 3D render.
Bathrooms/wet-room fixtures (toilet, shower, vanity) shown in the 2D plan are missing or not modeled; rooms appear empty/incorrect.
Interior wall alignment on the right side (hall/room partitions) does not match the 2D plan, altering room shapes and connections.
Bottom-center main entry door (double door in the 2D plan) is not correctly represented/placed in the 3D render.
Multiple interior door placements (especially along the central-right hall) do not correspond to the 2D plan; rendered as generic openings in different positions.
Window count/placement does not match the 2D plan; several exterior windows are missing and/or shifted.
Room proportions are distorted: central living/dining area appears oversized relative to adjacent rooms compared to the 2D plan.
Some internal partitions create altered/ambiguous room areas not clearly present in the 2D plan (hall/room segmentation differs).
Rendering uses simplified door/opening geometry (no door leaves/swing fidelity), reducing verification of door orientation and embedding.
